scripts.start: echo "Dev server currently has bugs with entrypoint ordering. Use 'yarn build && yarn serve' instead."
scripts.e2e:ci: yarn build && yarn serve & wait-on http-get://localhost:3001/ && npx cypress run --config-file ../cypress/config/cypress.config.ts --config '{"supportFile": "../cypress/support/e2e.ts"}' --spec "./e2e/*.cy.ts" --browser=chrome
